ValidationRule.description: Prevent the First Billing Month Date field from being updated multiple times.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISCHANGED(First_Billing_Month_Date__c), ( NOT(ISNULL(PRIORVALUE(First_Billing_Month_Date__c))) ), ($UserRole.Name <> "HRE Handbook Supervisor team 1"), ($UserRole.Name <> "HRE Handbook Supervisor team 2"), ($UserRole.Name <> "HRE Handbook Supervisor team 3"), ($UserRole.Name <> "System Administrator") )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You cannot change the 'First Billing Month Date' value.
